Dear all, dear Dave,

I am doing some stagnation flow flame simulations usi=
ng the prune
option, since there are series of flames to be studied.

Using=
 the "prune" option it somtimes happens that th programe gets
into an endle=
ss cycle, removing a point, adding it again, removing it,
etc.

Is there an=
y way to avoid this problem?
Thanks a lot!
